revised_title: Discovery of Antiquities in Ancient Herculaneum
tldr: Signor Camillo Paderni reports on the discovery of numerous artifacts, including metals, cameos, intaglios, glass, and various other items, in the ancient city of Herculaneum. He also mentions the difficulty in preserving and deciphering the found papirus, which was turned into a sort of charcoal. Additionally, he describes the discovery of three marble statues and six bronze heads, including a remarkable young Hercules.
